title: Ram tinah Kraws thihna hlu hi
lyrics:
Ram tinah Kraws thihna hlu hi,
Lo thang nghal se tul tak a ni;
Kalvari-ah khua lo var se,
A engin kil tin thleng rawh se.

Lalpa, kan Pathian, i hnathawh
Kawlkil thleng zelin tiharh rawh;
I khawngaih hneh theih lohva hi,
Ram tinah lar chhuak maw
i ang che.
